data.text: @trmentedfleet Yes and no! It depends who you talk to regarding that. But yeah it's :/ but just like with Lane Boy and the Love Wins letter, ultimately blown out of proportion to make them look bad

@trmentedfleet as long as they're not actively engaging in 'phobic' behaviors in addition to not liking a minority, then,,,,,,it's fine to not like them, tht's not 'phobic' or harmful until it becomes so.
